Darkvision.name: Darkvision
Darkvision.description: You can see in darkness and dim light just as well as you can see in bright light, though your vision in darkness is in black and white.

Low-Light Vision.name: Low-Light Vision
Low-Light Vision.description: Your ancestors have been tomb guardians for generations, and the power they cultivated to ward off necromancy has passed on to you. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a necromancy effect, you get a critical success instead.
